thread.title: Thanks for the people who work in the club lounge
thread.title_full: Thanks for the people who work in the club lounge - Review of Renaissance Beijing Capital Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

title: Thanks for the people who work in the club lounge
text: When I come to the club lounge to relax or do some things, the people who work in this are really friendly. Just like in Happy Hour time, there are no site that I can have my dinner, but Alisa and Kaas help me find a comfortable site and I can enjoy it. And thanks for all people work in there take care me so much. Next time I will also choice Beijing Renaissance hotel to finish my trip.
